name: Volt
description: Volt is a shiny oscilloscope-themed robot with vibrant yellow color. It has cat-shaped buttons, giving it a playful and charming appearance. Its arms and legs are also designed like cat paws, adding a touch of whimsy to its overall look. The screen of Volt is a classic display, reminiscent of retro oscilloscopes. As an extra feature, Volt is equipped with stylish shades, giving it a cool and fashionable edge. Volt is a proud member of the WebtrES club, showcasing its love for all things electronic and technological.
